Page0.PageText: The detective and his assistant look through an overview of what they know about the case.

Page1.PageText: Detective, look! The security cameras show that 3 of the suspects were out of view at the estimated time of the murder!

Page2.PageText: Hmm… That would mean that these 3 suspects may potentially be the culprit…

Page3.PageText: Where did they last appear in the cameras?

Page5.PageText: Grayvern went to the staff quarters.

Page7.PageText: Miyuki left the mansion to the garden outside.

Page8.PageText: The duke was outside at the time of the murder, and all 3 of these locations either have access to the outside, or go directly outside.

Page9.PageText: But just because the camera didn't catch them at the time, doesn't mean that they were the culprit.

Page10.PageText: The murderer could have placed a trap before the time of the murder to lure the duke into.

Page11.PageText: Let's interrogate each of the suspects about this.

Page12.PageText: The detective calls over each of them and asks them questions regarding their reasons for their whereabouts at the time of the murder.

Page13.PageText: The duke threw a glass of wine at me for being too slow with the drinks, so I headed over to the staff quarters to get a fresh change of clothes.

Page14.PageText: Before I departed, he told me to prepare more drinks afterward to be served at the garden outdoors.

Page15.PageText: By the time I reached the garden, however, the murder had already occurred.

Page16.PageText: …Why did I go to the restroom? That question is a little personal…

Page17.PageText: I had a LOT more drinks than I could handle… So much, in fact, that I felt like throwing up!

Page18.PageText: I went to the toilet to… ahem… “relieve” myself of that problem. When I was done, the murder had already occurred.

Page19.PageText: Why I went outside to the garden? Well,I had quite a lot to drink, and was feeling rather tipsy. When that happens, surrounding myself with fresh natural air usually makes me feel better.

Page20.PageText: I heard screaming and shouting after a short walk. When I went to investigate, I found Grayvern calling the authorities and the duke dead on the floor.

Page21.PageText: The fact that the duke was murdered at the same place I was is purely coincidental.
